code:
---
title Mission Lattice Orchestration
---
flowchart TD
  subgraph programme_helios_lattice[Helios Lattice Stewardship]
    helios_lattice_helios_command[Helios Lattice Command Spine\n420d · 210000 GW]
    helios_lattice_dyson_array_sequencer[Dyson Array Sequencer\n160d · 88000 GW]
    helios_lattice_mirror_hubs[Mirror Hub Calibration\n60d · 22000 GW]
    helios_lattice_dyson_array_sequencer --> helios_lattice_mirror_hubs
    helios_lattice_heat_dump[Thermal Dump Lattice\n80d · 18000 GW]
    helios_lattice_dyson_array_sequencer --> helios_lattice_heat_dump
    helios_lattice_helios_command --> helios_lattice_dyson_array_sequencer
    helios_lattice_bridge_hardening[Interplanetary Bridge Hardening\n140d · 36000 GW]
    helios_lattice_helios_command --> helios_lattice_bridge_hardening
    helios_lattice_guardian_autonomy[Guardian Autonomy Harmoniser\n120d · 24000 GW]
    helios_lattice_helios_command --> helios_lattice_guardian_autonomy
  end
  subgraph programme_luna_supply_gateway[Luna Supply Gateway]
    luna_supply_gateway_luna_logistics_core[Luna Logistics Core\n260d · 42000 GW]
    luna_supply_gateway_mass_driver[Mass Driver Throughput\n120d · 18000 GW]
    luna_supply_gateway_luna_logistics_core --> luna_supply_gateway_mass_driver
    luna_supply_gateway_cryo_buffer[Cryogenic Buffer Network\n90d · 8000 GW]
    luna_supply_gateway_luna_logistics_core --> luna_supply_gateway_cryo_buffer
    luna_supply_gateway_guardian_corridors[Guardian Corridor Drills\n70d · 6000 GW]
    luna_supply_gateway_luna_logistics_core --> luna_supply_gateway_guardian_corridors
  end
  subgraph programme_ares_lifeline[Ares Terraforming Lifeline]
    ares_lifeline_ares_hub[Ares Terraforming Hub\n360d · 62000 GW]
    ares_lifeline_regolith_chain[Regolith Chain\n150d · 26000 GW]
    ares_lifeline_ares_hub --> ares_lifeline_regolith_chain
    ares_lifeline_habitat_shielding[Habitat Shielding\n120d · 14000 GW]
    ares_lifeline_ares_hub --> ares_lifeline_habitat_shielding
    ares_lifeline_dyson_feedstock[Dyson Feedstock Harmonisation\n110d · 9000 GW]
    ares_lifeline_ares_hub --> ares_lifeline_dyson_feedstock
  end
  helios_lattice_heat_dump -.-> helios_lattice_mirror_hubs
  helios_lattice_bridge_hardening -.-> helios_lattice_dyson_array_sequencer
  helios_lattice_guardian_autonomy -.-> helios_lattice_bridge_hardening
  luna_supply_gateway_cryo_buffer -.-> luna_supply_gateway_mass_driver
  luna_supply_gateway_guardian_corridors -.-> luna_supply_gateway_cryo_buffer
  ares_lifeline_habitat_shielding -.-> ares_lifeline_regolith_chain
  ares_lifeline_dyson_feedstock -.-> ares_lifeline_habitat_shielding
  classDef risk-low fill:#0b3b31,stroke:#34d399,color:#ecfeff;
  classDef risk-medium fill:#1f2937,stroke:#fbbf24,color:#f8fafc;
  classDef risk-high fill:#7f1d1d,stroke:#f87171,color:#fef2f2;
class helios_lattice_helios_command risk-medium;
class helios_lattice_dyson_array_sequencer risk-medium;
class helios_lattice_mirror_hubs risk-low;
class helios_lattice_heat_dump risk-medium;
class helios_lattice_bridge_hardening risk-high;
class helios_lattice_guardian_autonomy risk-medium;
class luna_supply_gateway_luna_logistics_core risk-medium;
class luna_supply_gateway_mass_driver risk-medium;
class luna_supply_gateway_cryo_buffer risk-low;
class luna_supply_gateway_guardian_corridors risk-low;
class ares_lifeline_ares_hub risk-high;
class ares_lifeline_regolith_chain risk-medium;
class ares_lifeline_habitat_shielding risk-medium;
class ares_lifeline_dyson_feedstock risk-low;
repo_description: The Operating System for AGI Work.

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们来设计一下这个流程，首先需要一个开始节点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，Helios Lattice Stewardship就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: Helios Lattice Command Spine\n420d · 210000 GW、Dyson Array Sequencer\n160d · 88000 GW主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我同意这个观点。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 好的，那就按这个方案。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将Mirror Hub Calibration\n60d · 22000 GW、Thermal Dump Lattice\n80d · 18000 GW分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 好的，那就按这个方案。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: Interplanetary Bridge Hardening\n140d · 36000 GW、Guardian Autonomy Harmoniser\n120d · 24000 GW主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Interplanetary Bridge Hardening\n140d · 36000 GW、Guardian Autonomy Harmoniser\n120d · 24000 GW是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Interplanetary Bridge Hardening\n140d · 36000 GW、Guardian Autonomy Harmoniser\n120d · 24000 GW结束。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理Interplanetary Bridge Hardening\n140d · 36000 GW、Guardian Autonomy Harmoniser\n120d · 24000 GW？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将Luna Supply Gateway、Luna Logistics Core\n260d · 42000 GW分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我的意思是Luna Supply Gateway、Luna Logistics Core\n260d · 42000 GW应该这样理解...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: Mass Driver Throughput\n120d · 18000 GW主要包含以下几类。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 好的，那就按这个方案。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Mass Driver Throughput\n120d · 18000 GW结束。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将Cryogenic Buffer Network\n90d · 8000 GW、Guardian Corridor Drills\n70d · 6000 GW分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Cryogenic Buffer Network\n90d · 8000 GW、Guardian Corridor Drills\n70d · 6000 GW是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们应该如何处理Cryogenic Buffer Network\n90d · 8000 GW、Guardian Corridor Drills\n70d · 6000 GW？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 你能详细说明一下Cryogenic Buffer Network\n90d · 8000 GW、Guardian Corridor Drills\n70d · 6000 GW吗？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 这个系统主要由Ares Terraforming Lifeline、Ares Terraforming Hub\n360d · 62000 GW组成。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 确认一下，Ares Terraforming Lifeline、Ares Terraforming Hub\n360d · 62000 GW是正确的吧？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 你能详细说明一下Regolith Chain\n150d · 26000 GW吗？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 我们需要确保这个逻辑是正确的。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，Regolith Chain\n150d · 26000 GW有更好的性能。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 从结构上看，我们有Habitat Shielding\n120d · 14000 GW、Dyson Feedstock Harmonisation\n110d · 9000 GW。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 让我澄清一下，Habitat Shielding\n120d · 14000 GW、Dyson Feedstock Harmonisation\n110d · 9000 GW的作用是...

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 最后，流程到达Habitat Shielding\n120d · 14000 GW、Dyson Feedstock Harmonisation\n110d · 9000 GW结束。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 我们可以将分为几个类型。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 好的，那就按这个方案。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 相较于方案A，有更好的性能。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 整体架构包含、这几个部分。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
dialogue.utterance: 明白了，、就这样设计。

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_A
dialogue.utterance: 你能详细说明一下、吗？

dialogue.speaker: Speaker_B
